subject: Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: The former Yankee Jim Leyritz, 47, was given a year of probation and fined $500 for a drunken driving conviction resulting from a 2007 crash in which a 30-year-old woman died.
snippet: The former Yankee Jim Leyritz, 47, was given a year of probation and fined $500 for a drunken driving conviction resulting from a 2007 crash in which a 30-year-old woman died.
